text: The great Ice Drake felled by Greasus Goldtooth that earned him the title 'Drakecrush', Yuwei Xiaolin encountered his bones and rotten corpse during his travels. Now he rides him to war.
The unholy combination of warp-tech, cathayan engineering and absolute insanity has created an unstable instrument of death.
Only bones remain of their mortal forms, protected from attack by barding.
Driven mad by the stench of blood, they are eager to trample their prey into the dirt.
Only bones remain of their mortal forms, protected from attack by barding.
Driven mad by the stench of blood, they are eager to trample their prey into the dirt.

Deep within the catacombs of a ruin monestary, an artifact of great power lay hidden away. A bone holted dagger, adorned with intircate runes and symbols of dark magic, this unholy weapon was once used in forbidden and long thought forgotten rituals where the blood of the living was used to awaken the slumbering dead.

Hidden within the Celestial Dragon King's court lies a forbidden tome, sealed for centuries within it's most protected of vaults. Rumored to contain the darkest secrets of necromancy, the ancient texts speak of it's ability to reveal the location of a powerful artifact, capable of enhancing the dark rites, and granting its wielder the power to control the undead.
A Necromancer that can summon a Nightmare is no amateur in the black arts.
Devilish chariots imbued with dark and eldritch power, driving the Undead to greater, more macabre acts.
Infernal flames belch from dismal braziers, permeating the air with fragments of magic-confounding Warpstone.
When the lodestone bell rings, dark magic exudes and ripples across the battlefield.
Necromancers may summon a Hellsteed, a winged Nightmare, to take them wherever they wish.
